fields.description: Based on the discussion with [~templedf] in YARN-6757 the official case of YARN is YARN, not Yarn, so we should update all the md files.
fields.summary: Update Yarn to YARN in documentation

comments.body: [~miklos.szegedi@cloudera.com]: Are you working on it, if not, can I pick it up?
Have worked on changes. Unable to submit patch, as I don't have permissions for the same.
[~chetna] I have added you as a contributor to YARN. You should have the permission to submit a patch now. Let me know if you still cannot.
Thank you for signing up. I assigned it to you [~chetna].
Thanks [~haibo.chen] and [~miklos.szegedi@cloudera.com]. Please review the attached patch.
